main event: A detailed report of a UFO sighting near Houston, Texas on May 7, 1966, involving multiple witnesses.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 30-50 feet long and changed colors between red and green,The object was first observed at a 45-degree angle and disappeared at 30 degrees to the north,The sighting lasted for about an hour and included irregular blinking lights,Four confirmed witnesses observed the object through binoculars,The investigation concluded it was likely an optical illusion due to ground light reflection.
sighted object: one oval object with red and green lights
